world

Class WorldView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • world.WorldView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class WorldView
extends Observable
implements Observer
    Very simple prototype view. Observes and (minimally) reports updates in a World. Can be run standalone or with external controllers.
    Author:
    Neville
